cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and potential system instability during initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and potential system instability during initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌等級設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid_level'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並在初始化期間造成系統不穩定。
